item.title: SaltStack Automation in Mixed Environments
item.dc:creator: Brian Logan
item.description:
My goal is for this article to give someone a jump start on network automation. You are likely a network engineer or sysadmin who has some experience in the field and is looking to streamline his work.

Why would I want network automation?

If you are finding this article you most likely know that network automation is worth doing. I would just like to point out some of the things you should consider when configuring network automation.

Centralizing configuration including the unstated rules of deployment

Does anyone know why

How does SaltStack do network automation?

I have used SaltStack for automating desktop, server, and network tasks. It allows for me to quickly query, deploy, and test my network. I will dive a bit on what I have learned to do with SaltStack in the last ~3 years or so.
